external_references.description: Den Iuzvyk, Tim Peck. (2025, February 13). Analyzing DEEP#DRIVE: North Korean Threat Actors Observed Exploiting Trusted Platforms for Targeted Attacks. Retrieved August 19, 2025.
KISA. (2021). Phishing Target Reconnaissance and Attack Resource Analysis Operation Muzabi. Retrieved March 8, 2024.

objects.description: [Kimsuky](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0094) has checked for the presence of antivirus software with powershell Get-CimInstance -Namespace root/securityCenter2 – classname antivirusproduct.(Citation: KISA Operation Muzabi) [Kimsuky](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0094) has also obtained details on antivirus software through WMI queries using `Win32_OperatingSystem` and `SecurityCenter2.AntiVirusProduct`.(Citation: Securonix Kimsuky February 2025)
